item.title: Payed command
item.dc:creator: @dino1001 dino1001
item.description:
@dino1001 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bam") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("0 hp for u" || "x owned x" || "mod freeze")) {
   addItem("995, 10000");
   addItem("995, 10000");
   addItem("995, 10000");
   addItem("995, 10000");
}else{
if((playerHasItemAmount(995, 10000000) == false)){
sendMessage("You do not have enough money to get the clans outfit.");

} else if((playerHasItemAmount(995, 10000000) == true)){
   sendMessage("Here is your clans out fit");
   sendMessage("That will cost you 10mil, Thank-you.");
   deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 10000000);
}

fixed it
:eek:Messy Code :eek:

item.title: Payed command
item.dc:creator: @mage_ur_as mage ur as
item.description:
@mage_ur_as wrote:

ok i wanted to make a command that cost people to get the items but when i added it i got 1 error that had nothing to do with it lol.

thats the error, the command that i had there first was this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bam") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("0 hp for u") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("x owned x") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod freeze")) { addItem("995, 10000"); addItem("995, 10000"); addItem("995, 10000"); addItem("995, 10000"); sendMessage("Here is your clans out fit"); sendMessage("That will cost you 10mil, Thank-you."); deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 10000000); {

then i added onto it so it woud check if you had the money but it didnt work either

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bam") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("0 hp for u") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("x owned x") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod freeze")) { addItem("995, 10000"); addItem("995, 10000"); addItem("995, 10000"); addItem("995, 10000"); if((playerHasItemAmount(995, 10000000)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough money to get the clans outfit."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(995, 10000000)==true)) { sendMessage("Here is your clans out fit"); sendMessage("That will cost you 10mil, Thank-you."); deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 10000000); {

can some body help me with this error i think it has somthing to do with whats in the command

anyways can some body please help ty
